20101204081420.750|20101204081422.000|CCO|HAVE OUR THING THAT WE --
20101204081422.000|20101204081423.429|CCO|STUFF THAT WE WENT THROUGH --
20101204081423.429|20101204081424.857|CCO|>> Jay: SURE, SURE.
20101204081424.857|20101204081426.286|CCO|>> -- THAT HURT US, THAT WE 
20101204081426.286|20101204081427.714|CCO|HAVE TO COPE WITH, LIKE WHEN 
20101204081427.714|20101204081429.143|CCO|THEY TOOK OUR SLAVES AWAY.
20101204081429.143|20101204081430.571|CCO|THAT WAS HARD FOR US --
20101204081430.571|20101204081432.000|CCO|[ LAUGHTER ]
20101204081432.000|20101204081433.111|CCO|AND WE'RE STILL --
20101204081433.111|20101204081434.222|CCO|SO, IT'S PRETTY EVEN.
20101204081434.222|20101204081435.333|CCO|>> Jay: SO, IT'S EVEN?
20101204081435.333|20101204081436.444|CCO|>> YEAH.
20101204081436.444|20101204081437.556|CCO|>> Jay: IT'S EVEN!
20101204081437.556|20101204081438.667|CCO|ALL RIGHT, BE RIGHT BACK WITH 
20101204081438.667|20101204081439.778|CCO|ARON RALSTON.

20101204082505.000|20101204082507.000|CCO|THROUGH MY ARM.
